mapper.delete: DELETE FROM api_topsearch_weibo WHERE hotword IN ( SELECT t.hotword FROM ( SELECT hotword FROM api_topsearch_weibo GROUP BY hotword HAVING count( hotword ) > 1 ) t ) AND id NOT IN ( SELECT c.id FROM ( SELECT min( id ) id FROM api_topsearch_weibo GROUP BY hotword HAVING count( hotword )> 1 ) c )
delete from api_topsearch_weibo where id not in ( SELECT t.min_id FROM ( SELECT min( id ) AS min_id FROM api_topsearch_weibo GROUP BY hotword ) AS t )
